snippet.title: Uagi-Saba Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Uagi-Saba      Raise, care for and breed magical creatures called Mystics while carving out your ow underground sanctuary in this new breeding sandbox/creature care simulator by Undergroundies.

This game includes digital DNA, each mystic has it's own genes that determine body parts, stats and other genes and can be passed down through breeding to offspring.

Made in Game Maker Studio 1.4, Art in Photoshop, Animations in Spine


Watch this game being made live on Twitch daily at
https://www.twitch.tv/undergroundies

Music By Richard Batchelor

Enjoy, and please spread the word!
